trans-unit.source: The security token is missing.
trans-unit.target: 缺少安全權杖.

trans-unit.source: The specified authorization code is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的授權代碼無效.

trans-unit.source: The specified device code is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的裝置代碼無效.

trans-unit.source: The specified refresh token is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的重新整理權杖無效.

trans-unit.source: The specified token is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖无效.

trans-unit.source: The specified token is not an authorization code.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不是授權代碼.

trans-unit.source: The specified token is not an device code.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不是裝置代碼.

trans-unit.source: The specified token is not a refresh token.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不是重新整理權杖.

trans-unit.source: The specified token is not an access token.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不是存取權杖.

trans-unit.source: The specified identity token is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的識別碼權杖無效.

trans-unit.source: The specified authorization code has already been redeemed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的授權代碼已兌換.

trans-unit.source: The specified device code has already been redeemed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的设备代碼已兌換.

trans-unit.source: The specified refresh token has already been redeemed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的重新整理權杖已兌換.

trans-unit.source: The specified token has already been redeemed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖已兌換.

trans-unit.source: The authorization has not been granted yet by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者尚未批准授權.

trans-unit.source: The authorization was denied by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 使用者拒絕授權.

trans-unit.source: The specified authorization code is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的授權代碼不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The specified device code is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的裝置代碼不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The specified refresh token is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的重新整理權杖不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The specified token is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The authorization associated with the authorization code is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 與授權代碼關聯的授權不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The authorization associated with the device code is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 與裝置代碼關聯的授權不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The authorization associated with the refresh token is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 與重新整理權杖關聯的授權不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The authorization associated with the token is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 與權杖關聯的授權不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The token request was rejected by the authentication server.
trans-unit.target: 身份驗證伺服器拒絕了權杖請求.

trans-unit.source: The user information access demand was rejected by the authentication server.
trans-unit.target: 身份驗證伺服器拒絕了使用者資訊存取請求.

trans-unit.source: The specified user code is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的使用者代碼不再有效.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援引數 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The mandatory '{0}' parameter is missing.
trans-unit.target: 缺少必要引數 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter must be a valid absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: 引數 ’{0}’ 必須是有效的絕對路徑網址.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter must not include a fragment.
trans-unit.target: 引數 ‘{0}’ 不能包含 fragment.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援指定的 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}'/'{1}' combination is invalid.
The mandatory '{0}' scope is missing.
trans-unit.target: 缺少必要 Scope ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' scope is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許 Scope ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The client identifier cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: 消費者金鑰不能為空.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter cannot be used without '{1}'.
The status cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: 狀態不能為空.

trans-unit.source: Scopes cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: Scope 不能為空.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' and '{1}' parameters can only be used with a response type containing '{2}'.
trans-unit.target: 引數 ‘{0}’ 和 ‘{1}’ 只能在響應型別包含 ‘{2}’ 時使用.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' is not allowed when using PKCE.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PKCE 時不允許指定的 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: Scopes cannot contain spaces.
trans-unit.target: Scope 不能包含空格.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' is not valid for this client application.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 ‘{0}’ 對此連線應用程式無效.

trans-unit.source: The scope name cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: Scope 不能為空.

trans-unit.source: The scope name cannot contain spaces.
trans-unit.target: Scope 不能包含空格.

trans-unit.source: This client application is not allowed to use the authorization endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用授權端點.

trans-unit.source: The client application is not allowed to use the authorization code flow.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用授權代碼流程.

trans-unit.source: The client application is not allowed to use the implicit flow.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用隱式流程.

trans-unit.source: The client application is not allowed to use the hybrid flow.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用混合流程.

trans-unit.source: This client application is not allowed to use the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用指定的 Scope.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 ‘{0}’ 無效.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter is not valid for this client application.
trans-unit.target: 引數 ‘{0}’ 對此連線應用程式無效.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter required for this client application is missing.
trans-unit.target: 未提供此連線應用程式必要引數 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The specified client credentials are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連線應用程式機密無效.

trans-unit.source: This client application is not allowed to use the device endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用裝置端點.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' and '{1}' parameters are required when using the client credentials grant.
trans-unit.target: 使用連線應用程式機密授權時, 必須提供引數 ‘{0}’ 和 ‘{1}’.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter is required when using the device code grant.
trans-unit.target: 使用裝置代碼授權時, 必須提供引數 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The mandatory '{0}' and/or '{1}' parameters are missing.
trans-unit.target: 未提供必要引數 ‘{0}’ 和/或 ‘{1}’.

trans-unit.source: A scope with the same name already exists.
trans-unit.target: 已存在具有相同名稱的 Scope.

trans-unit.source: This client application is not allowed to use the token endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用權杖端點.

trans-unit.source: This client application is not allowed to use the specified grant type.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用指定的驗證類型.

trans-unit.source: The client application is not allowed to use the '{0}' scope.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用 Scope ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The specified authorization code cannot be used without sending a client identifier.
trans-unit.target: 若不傳送連線應用程式 ID, 則不能使用指定的授權代碼.

trans-unit.source: The specified device code cannot be used without sending a client identifier.
trans-unit.target: 若不傳送連線應用程式 ID, 則不能使用指定的裝置代碼.

trans-unit.source: The specified refresh token cannot be used without sending a client identifier.
trans-unit.target: 若不傳送連線應用程式 ID, 則不能使用指定的重新整理權杖.

trans-unit.source: The specified authorization code cannot be used by this client application.
trans-unit.target: 此連線應用程式不能使用指定的授權代碼.

trans-unit.source: The specified device code cannot be used by this client application.
trans-unit.target: 此連線應用程式不能使用指定的裝置代碼.

trans-unit.source: The specified refresh token cannot be used by this client application.
trans-unit.target: 此連線應用程式不能使用指定的重新整理權杖.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' parameter doesn't match the client redirection address the authorization code was initially sent to.
trans-unit.target: 指定的引數 ‘{0}’ 與最初發送的連線應用程式重新導向位址不匹配.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter cannot be used when no '{1}' was specified in the authorization request.
trans-unit.target: 若授權請求中未指定 ‘{1}’, 則不能使用指定的引數 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' parameter is not valid in this context.
trans-unit.target: 引數 ‘{0}’ 在此語境中無效.

trans-unit.source: This client application is not allowed to use the introspection endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式使用自省端點.

trans-unit.source: The specified token cannot be introspected.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不能自省.

trans-unit.source: The client application is not allowed to introspect the specified token.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式自省指定的權杖.

trans-unit.source: This client application is not allowed to use the revocation endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 此連線應用程式不允許使用吊銷端點.

trans-unit.source: This token cannot be revoked.
trans-unit.target: 無法吊銷此權杖.

trans-unit.source: The client application is not allowed to revoke the specified token.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此連線應用程式吊銷指定的權杖.

trans-unit.source: The mandatory '{0}' header is missing.
trans-unit.target: 缺少必要標頭 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The specified '{0}' header is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的標頭 ’{0}’ 無效.

trans-unit.source: This server only accepts HTTPS requests.
trans-unit.target: 此伺服器僅接受 HTTPS 請求.

trans-unit.source: The specified HTTP method is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 HTTP 方法無效.

trans-unit.source: A token with the same reference identifier already exists.
trans-unit.target: 已存在具有相同引用 ID 的權杖.

trans-unit.source: The token type cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: 權杖型別不能為空.

trans-unit.source: Multiple client credentials cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 無法指定多個連線應用程式機密.

trans-unit.source: The issuer associated to the specified token is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 與指定權杖關聯的頒發者無效.

trans-unit.source: The specified token is not of the expected type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不是預期型別.

trans-unit.source: The signing key associated to the specified token was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到與指定權杖關聯的簽名金鑰.

trans-unit.source: The signature associated to the specified token is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 與指定權杖關聯的簽名無效.

trans-unit.source: This resource server is currently unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 此資源伺服器當前不可用.

trans-unit.source: The specified token doesn't contain any audience.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不包含任何目標受眾.

trans-unit.source: The specified token cannot be used with this resource server.
trans-unit.target: 指定的權杖不能用於此資源伺服器.

trans-unit.source: The user represented by the token is not allowed to perform the requested action.
trans-unit.target: 不允許此權杖代表的使用者執行請求的操作.

trans-unit.source: No issuer could be found in the server configuration.
trans-unit.target: 在伺服器配置中找不到頒發者.

trans-unit.source: A server configuration containing an invalid issuer was returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了包含無效頒發者的伺服器配置.

trans-unit.source: The issuer returned in the server configuration is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器配置中返回的頒發者無效.

trans-unit.source: No JWKS endpoint could be found in the server configuration.
trans-unit.target: 在伺服器配置中找不到 JWKS 端點.

trans-unit.source: A server configuration containing an invalid JWKS endpoint URL was returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了包含無效 JWKS 端點的伺服器配置.

trans-unit.source: A server configuration containing an invalid introspection endpoint URL was returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了包含無效自省端點的伺服器配置.

trans-unit.source: The JWKS document didn't contain a valid '{0}' node with at least one key.
trans-unit.target: JWKS 文件中沒有 ‘{0}’ 節點.

trans-unit.source: A JWKS response containing an unsupported key was returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了包含不受支援的金鑰的 JWKS 響應.

trans-unit.source: A JWKS response containing an invalid key was returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了包含無效金鑰的 JWKS 響應.

trans-unit.source: The mandatory '{0}' parameter couldn't be found in the introspection response.
trans-unit.target: 自省響應中找不到必要引數 ‘{0}’.

trans-unit.source: The token was rejected by the remote authentication server.
trans-unit.target: 權杖被遠端身份驗證伺服器拒絕.

trans-unit.source: The '{0}' claim is malformed or isn't of the expected type.
trans-unit.target: Claim ‘{0}’ 格式錯誤或不是預期型別.

trans-unit.source: An introspection response containing a malformed issuer was returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了包含錯誤格式頒發者的自省響應.

trans-unit.source: The issuer returned in the introspection response is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 自省響應返回的頒發者無效.

trans-unit.source: The type of the introspected token doesn't match the expected type.
trans-unit.target: 自省權杖的型別與預期型別不匹配.

trans-unit.source: An application with the same client identifier already exists.
trans-unit.target: 已存在具有相同消費者金鑰的應用程式.

trans-unit.source: Only confidential, hybrid or public applications are supported by the default application manager.
trans-unit.target: 預設應用程式管理器僅支援機密、混合或公共應用程式.

trans-unit.source: The client secret cannot be null or empty for a confidential application.
trans-unit.target: 對於機密應用程式, 連線應用程式金鑰不能為空.

trans-unit.source: A client secret cannot be associated with a public application.
trans-unit.target: 連線應用程式金鑰不能與公共應用程式關聯.

trans-unit.source: Callback URLs cannot contain a fragment.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向位址不能包含 fragment.

trans-unit.source: The authorization type cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: 授權型別不能為空.

trans-unit.source: The specified authorization type is not supported by the default token manager.
trans-unit.target: 預設權杖管理器不支援指定的授權型別.

trans-unit.source: The client type cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: 連線應用程式型別不能為空.

trans-unit.source: Callback URLs cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向位址不能為空.

trans-unit.source: Callback URLs must be valid absolute URLs.
trans-unit.target: 重新導向位址必須是有效的絕對路徑網址.

trans-unit.source: Removes orphaned tokens and authorizations from the database.
trans-unit.target: 從資料庫中刪除孤立的權杖和授權.

trans-unit.source: Starts the scheduled task at regular intervals.
trans-unit.target: 定期啟動計劃的任務.
